scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dashboard" "npm run tool:scouter" "npm run tool:invoice" "npm run tool:email:server" "npm run tool:email:client"
scripts.tool:invoice: cd "Invoice Generator For Ungating" && npm run dev -- --port 5173
scripts.tool:email:client: cd "Html Email Thing/client" && npm run dev -- --port 5174
